meta.description: C60 olive oil (Charcoal blend) has been scientifically proven to reduce the effects of oxidation and aging, resulting in a longer lifespan for mammals. Try our C60 Oil today!

title: C60 Wolfe-Carbon-Detox SuperCharcoal with Organic Olive Oil (50mL)
cleaned_text:
Wolfe-Carbon-Detox our Traditional C60 product comes to you in a 50ml Miron Glass bottle.

C60 olive oil has been scientifically proven to reduce the effects of oxidation and aging, resulting in a longer lifespan for mammals.

In 2011, Fathi Moussa, a French scientist, led a team of researchers in a toxicity study on the C60 fullerene mixed with olive oil.

Scientists discovered that C60 improved the lifespan of the rats. The C60 mixture helped them live 95% longer (that is nearly twice their normal lifespan) — the greatest breakthrough in extending the life of animals ever.

Scientists attributed the results to C60's antioxidant properties as well as to its ability to biodistribute: to cross the cell membrane and distribute throughout living tissues.

Wolfe-Carbon-Detox is at the maximum fullerene concentration that the olive oil can absorb and suspend: 0.8 grams per liter (0.8 mg/ml). The product is filtered to 0.2 microns particle size or smaller.

How C60 Blended With Olive Oil Benefits You

C60 Olive Oil has the ability to increase longevity and prevent the dying of nerve cells. Through these effects, rats that participated in the study lived to almost double their natural lifespan.

Other studies found similar effects in mice, with the animals living 8 days longer in their 120-day lifetime. In another study, researchers found the lifespan of mice increased between 5 and 14 percent. This was true even when doses of C60 were started halfway through the lifespan of the mice. (1, 2)

Free radicals wreak havoc on the human body by reacting with almost any molecule and damaging it before moving on to other nearby molecules.

The result is increased signs of aging and the development of a variety of diseases.

In the modern world, free radicals attack the body from all sides. This includes air pollutants, cigarette smoke, pesticides and much, much more. Free radicals can even develop out of fried or processed foods.

Changing your diet, however, can only help so much; often, free radicals are simply unavoidable; that's where C60 oil and its ability to demolish free radicals comes in. (3)

Another noteworthy benefit of C60 oil is its ability to prevent inflammation, making it a powerful potential aide for those suffering from arthritis or joint-related pain.

In one study, researchers found that C60 can prevent inflammation in arthritic rats. (4)

According to one study, C60 – even in low concentrations – is able to annihilate the mosquito iridescent virus (MIV), proving its viability for combatting iridoviruses on the whole. (5)

The death of nerve cells is normal during the developmental process. However, sometimes nerves can be destroyed due to overworking as well. This poses a number of problems.

Thankfully, due to C60's antioxidant properties, it can protect your nerves from dying as a result of overworking. (6)

Up next on C60's amazing list of benefits is its potential for preventing osteoarthritis.

Thankfully, C60 may be able to prevent the breakdown of cartilage associated with osteoarthritis. Further, C60 can also prevent bone inflammation, as seen in studies on rabbits. (7)

If you've been diagnosed with metabolic syndrome (a cluster of symptoms that includes increased blood pressure, high blood sugar and more), you have a greater risk of developing those dangerous conditions as well, even with the best of lifestyles.

C60 may protect against metabolic syndrome while simultaneously preventing the growth of fat cells. (8)

C60 oil doesn't just kill off mosquito-related viruses; it can kill off streptococcus bacteria as well, which can contribute to strep throat, skin infections and toxic shock syndrome.

According to a study on mice by The American Society for Microbiology, C60 prevented death in 33% of mice infected with streptococcus bacteria. (9)

Further research suggests that C60's effectiveness in this regard could be even greater when combined with activated charcoal. (10)

C60 also protects the skin from UV damage.

As a bonus, C60 blends well with skin lotions, making it super easy to incorporate into your healthcare regimen. (11)

The best part is that you don't need any special mixture of C60 to use it topically – the same great mixture we sell for internal use works just fine for topical use as well.

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

opengraph.title: C60 Wolfe-Carbon-Detox SuperCharcoal with Organic Olive Oil (50mL)
opengraph.description:
Wolfe-Carbon-Detox our Traditional C60 product comes to you in a 50ml Miron Glass bottle.
Recommended Usage: Take 1-2 droppers full daily. (approximately 50 droppers full per 50ml bottle)
C60 Olive Oil
C60 olive oil has been scientifically proven to reduce the effects of oxidation and aging, resulting in a longer lifespan for mammals.
Clinical Research

In 2011, Fathi Moussa, a French scientist, led a team of researchers in a toxicity study on the C60 fullerene mixed with olive oil. 
Scientists discovered that C60 improved the lifespan of the rats. The C60 mixture helped them live 95% longer (that is nearly twice their normal lifespan) — the greatest breakthrough in extending the life of animals ever.

Scientists attributed the results to C60's antioxidant properties as well as to its ability to biodistribute: to cross the cell membrane and distribute throughout living tissues.
Wolfe-Carbon-Detox is at the maximum fullerene concentration that the olive oil can absorb and suspend: 0.8 grams per liter (0.8 mg/ml). The product is filtered to 0.2 microns particle size or smaller. 
How C60 Blended With Olive Oil Benefits You
1. Improved Longevity
C60 Olive Oil has the ability to increase longevity and prevent the dying of nerve cells. Through these effects, rats that participated in the study lived to almost double their natural lifespan.
Other studies found similar effects in mice, with the animals living 8 days longer in their 120-day lifetime. In another study, researchers found the lifespan of mice increased between 5 and 14 percent. This was true even when doses of C60 were started halfway through the lifespan of the mice. (1, 2)

2. C60 Buckminsterfullerene Protects Against Free Radicals

Free radicals wreak havoc on the human body by reacting with almost any molecule and damaging it before moving on to other nearby molecules.
The result is increased signs of aging and the development of a variety of diseases.
In the modern world, free radicals attack the body from all sides. This includes air pollutants, cigarette smoke, pesticides and much, much more. Free radicals can even develop out of fried or processed foods.
Changing your diet, however, can only help so much; often, free radicals are simply unavoidable; that's where C60 oil and its ability to demolish free radicals comes in. (3)
3. C60 Fights Inflammation
Another noteworthy benefit of C60 oil is its ability to prevent inflammation, making it a powerful potential aide for those suffering from arthritis or joint-related pain. 
In one study, researchers found that C60 can prevent inflammation in arthritic rats. (4)
4. C60 Kills Viruses
According to one study, C60 – even in low concentrations – is able to annihilate the mosquito iridescent virus (MIV), proving its viability for combatting iridoviruses on the whole. (5)
5. C60 Protects Nerves
The death of nerve cells is normal during the developmental process. However, sometimes nerves can be destroyed due to overworking as well. This poses a number of problems.
Thankfully, due to C60's antioxidant properties, it can protect your nerves from dying as a result of overworking. (6)
6. C60 May Prevent Osteoarthritis
Up next on C60's amazing list of benefits is its potential for preventing osteoarthritis.

Thankfully, C60 may be able to prevent the breakdown of cartilage associated with osteoarthritis. Further, C60 can also prevent bone inflammation, as seen in studies on rabbits. (7)
7. C60 Fights Obesity And Metabolic Syndrome
If you've been diagnosed with metabolic syndrome (a cluster of symptoms that includes increased blood pressure, high blood sugar and more), you have a greater risk of developing those dangerous conditions as well, even with the best of lifestyles.
C60 may protect against metabolic syndrome while simultaneously preventing the growth of fat cells. (8)
8. C60 Destroys Bacteria
C60 oil doesn't just kill off mosquito-related viruses; it can kill off streptococcus bacteria as well, which can contribute to strep throat, skin infections and toxic shock syndrome.
According to a study on mice by The American Society for Microbiology, C60 prevented death in 33% of mice infected with streptococcus bacteria. (9)
Further research suggests that C60's effectiveness in this regard could be even greater when combined with activated charcoal. (10)

9. C60 Prevents UV Damage
C60 also protects the skin from UV damage.
As a bonus, C60 blends well with skin lotions, making it super easy to incorporate into your healthcare regimen. (11)
The best part is that you don't need any special mixture of C60 to use it topically – the same great mixture we sell for internal use works just fine for topical use as well.

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
